file.name: reference-to-properties.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Spec with reference to proeprties
  description: ''
  termsOfService: http://swagger.io/terms/
  contact:
    email: apiteam@swagger.io
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  /pet:
    put:
      summary: ''
      operationId: updatePet
      requestBody:
        description: ''
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              properties:
                name:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Pet/properties/name'
        required: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: ''
          content: {}
components:
  schemas:
    Pet:
      required:
        - name
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          type: string

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /pet: put: operation "updatePet": requestBody: content: "application/json": parse schema: parse schema: name: parse schema: reference "#/components/schemas/Pet/properties/name": resolve reference "#/components/schemas/Pet/properties/name": schema not found
